Posts.Content: Thanks June  Yep I m not too concerned about treatment or immediate side effects more long term ones, especially as my left side over my heart and lungs. Have a lovely Xmas x x
Posts.Title: DCIS and radio

Posts.Content: I had a lumpectomy 4 weeks ago for med/ high grade Dcis with no invasive.  Have been recommended 15 sessions of radiotherapy and I am very unsure about this aggressive treatment and the long term side effects, not helped by the consultant saying DCIS is not cancer, wish they would make their minds up.  begs the question, if it s not. Why are they treating it as such  Anyway any experiences welcome and digging around! I have just joined this group so HAPPY XMAS X
Posts.Title: DCIS and radio
